ticket.title: Rails 2.3.4 and nested models attributes localization
ticket.original-body:
Hi,
In Rails 2.3.3 I had a localized attributes for nested models in such way:
some_model: submodel_attribute: FooBar submodel_second_attribute: BazBar
And it has worked for me without a problems. In Rails 2.3.4 it doesn't work anymore. Is it a bug or something has changed?
